We would be able to submit a payment schedule change request to the city team to review after the booking is at complete. Could you please advise the student to provide one or more of the following:

•            Student Finance – This needs to show maintenance loan breakdown and not tuition fees.

•            Letter confirming funding with a breakdown of detailing dates and amounts they would receive. The letter you shared says ‘a maintenance allowance of £17,304 per year (paid in three equal instalments across the academic year: September, January, and April)’, not monthly as you mentioned please double check.

•            Payslip

If the document is in a different currency than GBP please include the exchange rate so that the team can better assess the case.

Please also include the student’s proposed plan e.g. the specific dates and amounts they wish to pay. (example format below).

Instalment 1 - Day/Month/Year - £XXX.XX

Instalment 2 - Day/Month/Year - £XXX.XX

Instalment 3 - Day/Month/Year - £XXX.XX

timeline.content:
To whom it may concern ,

Thank you for your support with my accommodation booking.

I would like to request that my contract be changed to the 40-week option at £345 per week, which totals £13,800. I would also like my rent to be divided into three instalments aligned with my UCL maintenance allowance payments.

As per UCL’s confirmation, my maintenance allowance of £17,304 per year is paid in three equal instalments of £5,768 at the beginning of each academic term (September, January, and April). The allowance is paid directly into my account, and I am due to receive my first instalment immediately upon my arrival in the UK, which is anticipated to be 22 September 2025.

Please see my proposed plan below:
	•	Instalment 1 – 22/09/2025 – £4,600
	•	Instalment 2 – 13/01/2026 – £4,600
	•	Instalment 3 – 27/04/2026 – £4,600

This plan ensures that each rent instalment is fully covered by the corresponding UCL maintenance instalment, with sufficient funds left for living costs.

Thank you for considering my request, and please let me know if there is any additional information you require.

Kind regards,
Mauricette Isasi
